Html:
Hi All,

Like many I had an issue with some office 2007/2010 files not working and have found that if you grab the latest project files (currently build 59893) this should resolve your files. It seems that development has continued but the main download has not been updated for some time.

Other than I congratulate the dev team on this as you have saved me hours of work trying to get this working for a website I am creating at the moment.
